Summary: 2 lights then 1 light then about 5-7 lights.
trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Abilene
There was one other sighting in Abilene on or around January 29th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI just saw this about 15 minutes ago at first 2 orange lights appeared and as quickly as they appeared they dissapeared ..then it came back about 2 minutes later as 1 orange light ..then a few minutes later it came back as a row of about 5-7 lights and it came on in a sequence ..it was orange and as it was very bright ..wow im still shaking ..this was just an awesome sight ..someone else had of seen this in the area ..it was huge when it came back the 3rd time ..i'll edit this later ..when I can think better ..also I grabbed my camera but it dissapeared to quickly for me to snap a picture ..
